title: Ep58: South Notts Hussars - Germany & Post-War
itunes:title: Ep58: South Notts Hussars - Germany & Post-War
itunes:subtitle: It's a sad day! Pete and Gary bid farewell to the brave men of the South Notts Hussars in this final podcast following their exploits in the Second World War. This episode explores their time in Germany and their demobilisation at the end of the war....
description:
It's a sad day! Pete and Gary bid farewell to the brave men of the South Notts Hussars in this final podcast following their exploits in the Second World War. This episode explores their time in Germany and their demobilisation at the end of the war.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Peter Hart's Military History is a Living History production.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
